Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Horley is approximately 24 miles east of Guildford and 30 miles south of
London with a direct train from Horley Station to Clapham Junction that
takes just 24 minutes. The premises comprise a three storey building occupying a prominent corner location in Horley town centre.
Located on the High Street, the main shopping area of Horley, there are many national retailers situated in close proximity, including Boots Optician and Subway. A goad plan is on the reverse of these particulars identifying the location.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The ground floor comprises the main banking hall and two self-contained sublet retail units.
The upper floors comprise offices, with part of the first floor currently occupied by the bank. At the rear is a private car park for 10 cars.

Tenure
The property is held on an existing FRI lease due to expire 08/02/2022.

Rent
Offers accepted on the basis of assignment or sub-lease at the passing rent of £113,500 pa.

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current rateable value of the property is £64,000 and the rates payable are £32,256. The UBR for 2019/20 is 50.4p.
Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Reigate, an affluent commuter town on the outskirts of the M25 in Surrey, has excellent road and rail links to London and the surrounding area.

The bank is situated on the corner where Church Street meets Market Square and Bell Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The bank is arranged over basement, ground, first and second floors. Ground floor consists of the main banking hall, with office and ancillary space on first and second floors. The basement holds the safe and vault.

Tenure
The property is held on an existing FRI lease due to expire 23/06/2021 at a passing rent of £64,000 per annum exclusive.

Consideration
Offers accepted on the basis of assignment or sub-lease at the passing rent of £64,000 pa.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £55,500 and the rates payable are £27,972 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 50.40p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
edhill is a popular and affluent commuter town in Surrey.
It is located approximately 20 miles south of London and
8.5 miles north of Gatwick Airport. Neighbouring towns to
Redhill include Reigate, Dorking, Horley and Leatherhead.
The town benefits from excellent transport links and is
situated close to junction 7 of the M25. Redhill station
provides rail links into London Victoria with an average
journey time of 30 minutes
The subject property is located in a prominent position on
Bletchingly Road, with nearby retailers including Co-op,
Goodrich Dry Cleaners and Day Lewis Pharmacy.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is ground floor retail unit.

Tenure
Leasehold

Rent
£13,200 per annum.

Terms
The premises are available by way of a sub-lease or
assignment of the existing effective FRI lease expiring
05/06/2026.
A copy of the lease is available on request.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £6,495.00 and the rates payable are £ pa. The UBR for 2020/2021 is p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Coulsdon is within the London Borough of Croydon, located 15 miles south of Central London and 11 miles southwest of Bromley.

Situated in a prominent position among a local parade, Chipstead Valley Road consists of primarily local and independent retailers. These include, Londis, Valley Pharmacy and Rolling on Cycles.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises a double fronted ground floor retail unit.  The shop offers an open plan sales area with amenities to the rear which include toilets, kitchenette and a storage area.

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 25/12/2021 with a further right of renewal.

A copy of the lease is available on request

Rent
£15,700 per annum exclusive.

Rates
Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Cobham, a village in the Borough of Elmbridge in Surrey,
is centred 17 miles south-west of London and 10 miles
northeast of Guildford on the River Mole. The village is well
served by public transport, with trains running from
Cobham & Stoke D'Abernon to London Waterloo in 40
minutes.
The village has a mix of national and independent retailers,
including Waitrose, Fat Face, Starbucks and Mint Velvet,
amongst others.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is arranged with the retail element on the
ground floor, with a vacant upper floor maisonette. Details
on request.
The property benefits from 6 car parking spaces to the
rear.

Tenure
The property is held on an existing FRI lease due to expire
26/03/2024 at a passing rent of £94,000 per annum
exclusive.

Rent
Offers considered on the basis of an assignment at the
current passing rent, or on a sublease of the ground floor
only in the region of £83,000 per annum.

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the
current rateable value of the property is £87,500 and the
rates payable are £44,100. The UBR for 2019/20 is
50.4p.
Interested parties should make their own enquiries in this
regard.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The subject premises occupy a prime ground floor location at the entrance to the beauty hall in Bentalls department store. The property is adjacent to Boots and other retailers within the immediate vicinity include Timberland, Hugo Boss and Hollister.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is comprised at ground floor only, with storage, staff and ancillary accommodation to the rear.

Service Charge
£24,100 per annum.

Rent
The passing rent is £135,000 per annum exclusive.

Terms
The premises are held by way of a lease expiring 22nd October 2027. There is a tenant only break option on 22nd October 2022.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £109,500.00 and the rates payable are £57,378.00 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 52.40p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Ashford is a predominately residential area located approximately 13 miles South West of London Central.
The subject property is situated among a diverse mix of local retailers including food, fashion and service operators, as well as some cafes and restaurants. Nearby occupiers include a Tescos, Off License and multiple Local Restaurants.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises a ground floor retail unit fronting Staines Road.  The unit offers an open plan sales area with amenities to the rear which include two toilets, kitchenette and storage areas.

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 30/11/2021 with a further right of renewal.
A copy of the lease is available on request.

Rent
£14,000 per annum exclusive.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £9,300.00 and the rates payable are £4,566.30 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes
